text: itane mein unheen do me se ek aurat sharmeelee chaal se aayee (aur moosa se) kahane lagee-mere vaalid tum ko bulaate hain taaki tumane jo (hamaaree bakariyon ko) paanee pila diya hai tumhen usakee mazadooree de garaz jab moosa unake paas aae aur unase apane kisse bayaan kie to unhonne kaha ab kuchh andesha na karo tumane zaalim logon ke haath se najaat paayee
